name: Forest Defender (FlintLokWood)
description:
In this game you're supposedly a little treant fighting through people wanting to claim the land.

As a treant yourself you have a bit of mother nature's power in your hand, which is to summon vines to block enemies vision.

Now with that outta the way, i procastinated way too much and didnt finish making all the sprites -_-

Gimme all your thoughts and advices about the game, probably some tips to reduce procastination too :p

Also play in fullscreen, because the html5 screen size is wack

Many Thanks :)
